blueprint.description: Installs Brave Browser on nearly any OS
blueprint.overview: [Brave Browser](https://brave.com/) is a free and open-source web browser developed by Brave Software, Inc. based on the Chromium web browser. It includes the ability to access Tor websites and has a built-in plugin that replaces ads and pays you to surf the web.
blueprint.name: Brave Browser
blueprint.title: Brave Browser
